== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''General'''
* Blocks that can be replaced (fire, water, lava), no longer get used up when placed in a space with the same block ID.
* Unsupported non-solid blocks now drop themselves.

'''[[File:Glass JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Glass]]'''
* Now no longer drops itself.
* No longer obtained through smelting gravel.

'''[[File:Gravel JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Gravel]]'''
* Now fall immediately when placed once again.

'''[[File:Sand JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Sand]]'''
* Now fall immediately when placed once again.

'''[[File:Torch JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Torch]]'''
* Now it needs support.
* Now it no longer automatically rotate based off block around them.
** The player can now choose which direction torches face.
** Because of this torches placed in existing worlds always face straight up.<ref name="Forum4">{{link|https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/archive/alpha/alpha-survival-single-player/796830-farms-dying-and-torches-reset|title=Yes. My torches don't attach to the wall. Its because you can now choose where to place it. E.g. if there are two walls in contact aim and one wall to place it. Remove and aim at other and it goes on there. But my water level is still the same.|author=Zaldos|website=Minecraft Forum|date=February 12, 2010}}</ref>

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Daylight cycle]]'''
* Now each cycle lasts about 20 minutes each.
** 10 minutes of sun and 10 minutes of moon each cycle.
* Stars now appear in the night sky.

=== General ===
'''[[Controls]]'''
* Pressing {{Key|ESC}} now pauses the burning animation.</onlyinclude>

'''General'''
* Items drop in a straight line with little variation. {{verify|edition=java|type=untestable}}
* Changed texture of splash particles.
* Skins now display in the inventory, however, the player appears completely black unless a skin proxy is used. In this version, the player model is always shown with Notch's skin.
* Caves darkened. {{verify|edition=java|type=untestable}}

== Technical ==
'''[[Debug screen]]'''
* Added an "L" (lighting updates) value.

== Removals ==
'''[[Weather]]'''
* Removed rain.

== Fixes ==
'''From Indev 20100211'''
* Fixed a bug causing daytime to not go back to full brightness after one night.
'''From Indev 0.31 20100104'''
* Due to the removal of rain from in-game play, the game no longer freezes when raining on map borders.
